sys_ux_client_script.name: setSidebarRatio

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_58089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbdd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Sales Order Case">9c0892c11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcb5f</macroponent><name>setSidebarRatio</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    if (event.payload.interaction === "USER_ACTION") {
        const sidebarRatio = event.payload.dividerPosition;
        const sidebarRatioPreference = api.state.sidebarRatioPreference;

        api.setState('sidebarRatioSaved', sidebarRatio);

        api.data.setSidebarRatioPreference.execute({
            'name': sidebarRatioPreference,
            'value': sidebarRatio
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 18:25:57</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>58089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbdd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setSidebarRatio</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_58089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbdd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 18:25:57</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
